donation.title: Make a donation in {{firstname, capitalize}}'s memory
donation.text-org: L’ensemble de la famille souhaite rendre hommage à {{firstname, capitalize}} en organisant une collecte de dons au profit de {{org}}.
donation.text-family: L’ensemble de la famille souhaite rendre hommage à {{firstname, capitalize}} en organisant une collecte de dons.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: This page was created by {{firstname, capitalize}}'s family. Should you have any questions, please reach out to the following contacts:

support.title: Support {{firstname, capitalize}}'s family
support.text: Here are 3 ways you can make a difference and support {{firstname, capitalize}}'s family:

guestbook.title: Sign the InMemori book
guestbook.text:
Send your respect to the family.
 share your memories of {{firstname, capitalize}}.
 Add a picture.

donation.title: Make a donation
donation.text-family: The family is organizing a fundraiser in {{firstname, capitalize}}'s memory.
donation.text-org: The family is organizing a fundraiser in {{firstname, capitalize}}'s memory. Proceeds will go to {{org}}.

share.title: Share this page
share.text: The family needs you. Help them invite all of {{firstname, capitalize}}'s friends by sending the link to this page so they can contribute.

message.input-message-placeholder: Write a message for the family or share a memory of {{firstname, capitalize}}...

donation.title: New donation
donation.receipt:
Your payment was successful!
Payment reference: {{id}}

delete.title: Are you sure ?
delete.text: You are about to delete {{fullname}} memorial page.

link.title: Send this page
link.text: Send this page to family, friends, and everyone who cared about {{fullname}}, by sending them this link:

admin.title: Share admin page
admin.text: Share access to {{fullname}} page, by sending this link to an administrator:

stripe.label: By registering your account, you agree to our Services Agreement and the Stripe Connected Account Agreement.
stripe.agreement: Payment processing services for users on Inmemori are provided by Stripe and are subject to the Stripe Connected Account Agreement, which includes the Stripe Terms of Service (collectively, the “Stripe Services Agreement”). By agreeing to these terms or continuing to operate as a user on Inmemori, you agree to be bound by the Stripe Services Agreement, as the same may be modified by Stripe from time to time. As a condition of Inmemori enabling payment processing services through Stripe, you agree to provide Inmemori accurate and complete information about you and your business, and you authorize Inmemori to share it and transaction information related to your use of the payment processing services provided by Stripe.
